title: Fried baby pineapple with mint and cream

default: 1 baby pineapple, skin cut off, halved and sliced

steps: Melt the butter in a frying pan and lightly fry the pineapple slices on both sides for 3-4 minutes, or until they start to colour.
Transfer the pineapple slices onto a servin g plate, spoon over the double cream and garnish with fresh mint and a wedge of lemon.
